skills.name: New Moon (月下の無)
text: On [Torpedo Salvo] all allies gain "Mugestu". On [Secondary Battery Salvo], all allies gain "Oborotsuki"
Every time Atago gains either ”Hazuki", "Oborotsuki" or "Mugetsu", increases damage by 10%.

skills.name: Extermination - Chaos (鏖殺・乱勢)
text: When Atago has both "Mugestu" and "Oborotsuki", immediately add an additional [Torpedo Salvo] charge. Afterwards, remove both "Mugetsu" and "Oborotsuki".
When Atago has all 3 "Hazuki", "Oborotsuki" and "Mugetsu", deals 100% of Atago Firepower to the lowest health enemy. Afterwards, removes all 3 effects.

skills.name: Broken Moon (壊れた月)
text: Atago's [Torpedo Salvo] Damage and Crit Chance increased by 30% and 100% respectively.
